title: Help me decide
content: Hi guys i need help decideing if i should take pes aiml rr, pes cse ec or go for ece mit

comments.body: Are you interested in CS or ECE? If CS, I personally would suggest PES CSE EC. You can also take PES AIML RR if you find its location to be more convenient, but both the campuses are basically the same, especially wrt placements. If not interested in ECE, would not recommend MIT ECE.
Any reason as to why to choose cse ec over aiml rr?
Any reason as to why to choose cse ec over aiml rr?

Again the same shitü§¶üèºü§¶üèº. Dude you're literally comparing two different branches of engineering. ECE is gonna be way more harder and you can manage if and only if you're good at engineering mathematics. 

And if you're looking for CSE go for the core one because you will get to explore a variety of courses in the branch instead of just sticking to ai/ml in 
cse(ai/ml) branch.

you can always have an AIML specialisation through electives if you take normal CSE. Not possible through AIML afaik. My knowledge about this isn't clear but you can definitely have different specialisations through your elective choices. I can forward you a document about the same if you're interested
